tool_description: Segments qualified leads into targeted groups based on characteristics, scores, and business priorities for customized sales and marketing approaches.

lead_profiles.description: Array of qualified lead profiles as JSON strings

segmentation_criteria.description: Criteria for creating segments: industry, company_size, score_range, geographic, behavioral

max_segments.description: Maximum number of segments to create (2-20)

segment_size_balance.description: Whether to balance segment sizes or allow natural distribution

error_messages: Invalid lead profiles: All items in lead_profiles must be valid JSON strings.
Invalid segmentation criteria: Use valid criteria from [industry, company_size, score_range, geographic, behavioral, job_function, technology, revenue].
Invalid segment count: max_segments must be between 2 and 20.
Insufficient leads for segmentation: Need at least 2 qualified leads to create segments.
Segmentation failed: Unable to create meaningful segments with provided criteria.
usage: Provide lead_profiles array with qualified leads and segmentation_criteria defining how to group leads. Set max_segments and segment_size_balance to control segmentation output.

segments.description: Array of segment definitions with lead assignments as JSON strings

segment_summary.description: Overview of created segments with key characteristics

leads_per_segment.description: Number of leads assigned to each segment

unassigned_leads.description: Count of leads that couldn't be assigned to any segment
